content.raw: I think this would be difficult to address at the moment. ign-gazebo is creating the numbered paths when it finds an existing `log` directory, and we don't have a mechanism to override this behavior. If the GameLogic plugin creates a unique `log` directory, then ign-gazebo will also create another unique `log` directory.
content.html: I think this would be difficult to address at the moment. ign-gazebo is creating the numbered paths when it finds an existing log directory, and we don't have a mechanism to override this behavior. If the GameLogic plugin creates a unique log directory, then ign-gazebo will also create another unique log directory.
